Guest at the AAMI Victoria Derby Day on Saturday 30th October 2010 at Flemington and was provided 2 complimentary tickets and hospitality
Guest at the Emirates Melbourne Cup Day on Tuesday 2nd November at Flemington. Provided with two complimentary tickets and hospitality
Guest of AALD, travelled to the United States to attend the West Coast Leadership Dialogue. All flights, accommodation and hospitality provided by AALD.
Guest at the Australian Open on the evening of Monday 17th January 2011 and was provided 2 complimentary tickets and hospitality.
Guest of AICC and travelled to Israel to attend the Trade Mission. All flights, accommodation and hospitality were provided by the AICC.

Guest of ExxonMobile Australia and attended La Boheme at the Victorian State Theatre and was provided with 2 complimentary tickets and hospitality.
Guest of AFL and attended the Essendon V Collingwood ANZAC day game and was provided with 2 complimentary tickets and hospitality.
Guest of Melbourne Football Club and attended the Melbourne Demons v Collingwood Pies game and was provided with 2 complimentary tickets and hospitality.
Attended the Australian American Leadership Dialogue in Perth and was provided with all meals and hospitality.
Guest of Melbourne Football Club and attended the Carlton Blues v Melbourne Demons game and was provided with 2 complimentary tickets and hospitality.

Guest of Huawei Technologies on a trip to Hong Kong and China. Provided with complimentary travel and hospitality. Personal Staffer, Cameron Hill, also attended this trip and was also provided with complimentary travel and hospitality.
Guest of Infrastructure Partnerships Australia at the Australian Open, and was provided two complimentary tickets and hospitality.
Guest of UBS Investment Bank at the Australian Open, and was provided two complimentary tickets and hospitality.
Guest of the AFL at the ANZAC Day Clash between Essendon and Collingwood, and was provided two complimentary tickets and hospitality.
Received an advance payment from Melbourne University Publishing for my book, "Black Dog Daze: Public Life, Private Demons".
Received a royalty payment for books sold thus far, and further similar payments are expected over time.
Guest of the Essendon Football Club at the Chairman's Function at the Essendon V Richmond match. Provided with two tickets and hospitality.
Attended the American Leadership Dialogue in the USA. My flights and accommodation in Seattle and Dallas were covered by the Dialogue.
Travelled as a guest on a private jet from Hamilton Island to Melbourne after attending the Australian Davos Connection Retreat. Accompanied by my wife, Maureen.
Attended the Australian Davos Connection (ADC) Forum in Hayman Island and the ADC Forum covered a portion of the expense relating to my hotel accommodation.

disclosures.entity: Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR)
disclosures.details: Participated in The Special Visitors Programme to Hong Kong as a sponsored guest of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR). My flights, hotel accommodation and meals at the hotel were covered by HKSAR.

Accepted an invitation from La Trobe University for myself and my wife to attend a weekend in Beechworth, Victoria for the 2013 Opera on the Alps event. Our hotel accommodation, opera tickets and hospitality were provided.

Attended The Antigua Forum in Antigua. The Antigua Forum covered air transportation to and from Guatemala, ground transportation in Guatemala to and from the event, plus accommodation and meals during the forum.
Attended the Grand Prix Formula One as a guest of the Ten Network. All meals and hospitality was provided.
Attended the CEO Retreat in New Zealand with my wife, Maureen. The CEO Retreat covered business class return air transportation to and from New Zealand, as well as accommodation and hospitality.
Accepted an invitation from CUB to attend the 2013 AFL Anzac Day lunch and match at the MCG on 25 April 2013.
